item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

This is a bad guide because when players are in trade and they dc for any reason server restart they loose everything in trade
same with dueling…
add a if not in trade and not inDuel statement and it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Easisest Way to stop rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

RuneScape only saves accounts on logout or disconnects. They don’t need to constantly save like private servers because they have stability. If people actually used servers that were stable, they wouldn’t need to constantly save character files.

Also, saving every character per 1 second is a horrible idea for big servers which would cause too much lag.

Read full topic

item.title: Easisest Way to stop rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @n00bish n00bish
item.description:
@n00bish wrote:

This is a snippet I did, really simple but it works.

Add this below public boolean process() {

if (annoTimer > 0) { annoTimer--; } else { saveNeeded = true; savegame(true); annoTimer = 1; }

Explanation: This code makes a timer that every 1 second it saves the player’s account.

Read full topic
